p: The objectives of our study are to (1) identify the most important medicinal plants and their uses in Kongo phytotherapy, (2) asses the ethno-cultural similarity of medicinal plant use knowledge between the two territories and compare medicinal plant knowledge (number of species cited and number of diseases treated) between different social groups distinguished according to respondentsâ€™ gender, age, marital status, education level, experience, type, and residence.
